definition: model teacher of every age (idiom)/eternal paragon/refers to Confucius (551-479 BC) 孔子[Kong3 zi3]
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔夫子[Kong3 fu1 zi3]
Confucius (551-479 BC), Chinese thinker and social philosopher, also known as 孔子[Kong3 zi3]

the teaching of Confucius and Mencius
Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)
a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
restrain yourself and return to the rites (idiom, from Analects); to subdue self and observe proprieties/(any number of possible translations)
Confucian thoughts/the thinking of the Confucian school
Zhu Xi or Chu Hsi (1130-1200), also known as Master Zhu 朱子, Song dynasty Confucian writer and propagandist, founder of neo-Confucianism
